name: Mr. Tickleums
description:
A game I made for 0h Game Jam (made in one hour at 2 am). I am sorry if you play this, I blame my deliriousness. I doubt I will update this any further, was more or less just an experiment to see what I can accomplish in an hour. Maybe someday I'll turn it into something proper but.........

Controls/Tutorial

WASD to move, E to enter attack mode which kills rats but destroys yarn. Collect 100 yarn to win (probably impossible) . ESC to instantly quit the game.

Post Jam Updates:
Optimization to lower file size.
Fullscreen/Hidden Cursor.
Added an icon.
